job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: role infra devops engineerltbrgtlocation morrisville nc remote till covidltbrgtmode contractltbrgtltbrgtdetailed job descriptionltbrgt minimum years as an infrastructure devops or automation engineerltbrgt proficient in server side scriptingltbrgt knowledge of devops capabilities such as continuous integration and delivery cicd automated testing etcltbrgt knowledge on terraform is must preferably in azureltbrgt good exposure on micro services architecture and their deployment in cloud world especially azure terraformltbrgt should have worked on setting up amp troubleshooting kubernetes clusters in production ready environmentltbrgt help teams in migration from monolithic application to micro services using containerization solutions docker kubernetesltbrgt worked on onboarding micro services middlewareui components using devops technique amp look for improvementsltbrgt prior experience in automating cicd process platform services using open source toolsltbrgtltbrgtjerrinsmartitframecom
